headline: ComEd Begins Testing Phase of First of Its Kind Vehicle-to-Grid Charging Pilot with Local School Districts
summary: CHICAGO, September 10, 2025--ComEd today announced the start of its vehicle-to-grid (V2G) charging pilot’s testing phase with three Illinois school districts. The V2G charging pilot is the first of its kind in northern Illinois and will evaluate the technology that could enable bidirectional charging with electric school buses to enhance energy optimization, support grid stability and create new ways for customers to potentially lower their energy usage during peak demand times.
